data.title: Sivaji Ganesan: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Sivaji Ganesan: Check out the list of all Sivaji Ganesan movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Sivaji Ganesan news on Times of India.
data.text:
Not Tamil Nadu, Rajinikanth's 'Padayappa' re-released in theaters in the USA as it completes 25 years

etimes.in / Jul 01, 2024, 13:37 (IST)

Rajinikanth's classic 'Padayappa' re-released in the USA after 25 years, directed by KS Ravikumar, starring Soundarya and Ramya Krishnan. Fans share buzz on social media about Sivaji Ganesan's crucial role. The film's success at the box office exceeded Rs 50 crore. Upcoming films 'Vettaiyan' and 'Coolie' are in production.

Kamal Haasan recalls how he had 'almost in tears in his eyes' when he saw Dilip Kumar for the FIRST time

etimes.in / Jun 29, 2024, 14:07 (IST)

Veteran star Kamal Haasan who has created a niche in the Indian film industry with his stellar performances recalls how he almost had tears in his eyes when he saw Dilip Kumar for the first time.

The man who once trumped NT Rama Rao as Krishna

TNN / May 13, 2024, 04:08 (IST)

P V Narasimha Bharathi, a talented Tamil actor from the Sourashtra community, was revered in the early days alongside MGR and Sivaji Ganesan. Despite his impactful contributions, his centenary year passed unnoticed, highlighting a sad neglect in his recognition.

Did you know Rajinikanth has Maharashtrian roots but has NOT worked in a single Marathi movie? - ETimes BFFS

etimes.in / Mar 10, 2024, 14:00 (IST)

Rajinikanth, a global sensation, embodies simplicity both on and off the screen. Hailing from Pune, Maharashtra, he has warmly embraced all aspects of South Indian culture. Guided by his elder brother, he emerged as a superstar with a rechristened name. He is married to Latha and they have two daughters.

Ashok Selvan, Vasanth Ravi, and Aishwarya Lekshmi team up for a triangular love story

etimes.in / Feb 09, 2024, 14:22 (IST)

Director Priya, who hasn't made a feature film in the last 16 years, is set to make her comeback with the romantic drama 'Pon Ondru Kanden'. The film stars Ashok Selvan, Aishwarya Lekshmi, and Vasanth Ravi.

Actor Prabhu acknowledges Kerala's love for his father, Sivaji Ganesan

etimes.in / Jan 24, 2024, 12:26 (IST)

During the event, Prabhu conveyed the profound fondness Kerala held for his father, reminiscing about the enduring love bestowed upon Sivaji Ganeshan during and after his lifetime. He shared personal anecdotes from shooting in Kerala villages, where the mere mention of Sivaji Ganeshan stirred nostalgic tears. The occasion witnessed the unveiling of the movie's inaugural poster.

Tovino Thomas’ ‘Nadikar Thilakam’ gets a new title; details inside

etimes.in / Jan 24, 2024, 11:43 (IST)

The film 'Nadikar Thilakam' starring Tovino Thomas and directed by Lal Jr. has changed its title to 'Nadikar'. The decision to change the title was made after Prabhu, son of iconic actor Sivaji Ganesan, requested the change due to sentimental value associated with the original title. The film also features Soubin Shahir and is written by Suvin Somasekharan.

"He would have LOL": Fardeen Khan on Zeenat Aman's claim of pay cut in 'Qurbani'

ANI / Jan 06, 2024, 12:32 (IST)

Fardeen Khan responds to Zeenat Aman's claims about Feroz Khan cutting her pay on Qurbani sets. Fardeen says Feroz would have laughed at her post and mentions the standard family discount. Zeenat reshared Fardeen's story. Qurbani, released in 1980, was directed by Feroz Khan and starred Vinod Khanna, Zeenat Aman, and Amjad Khan. Zeenat will next be seen in Bun Tikki alongside Shabana Azmi and Abhay Deol.

The village cashier who turned movie mogul

TNN / Aug 30, 2023, 09:04 (IST)

Hailing from Sirukoodalpatti, a nondescript village in the Chettinad region, educated only up to middle school and without any godfathers in the film industry, A L Srinivasan, or ALS as he came to be known in the film world, went on to become a prolific film producer, studio baron and industry leader respected even by the greatest stars of Hindi cinema of the day, like Dilip Kumar, Rajesh Khanna and Amitabh Bachchan.

Sathyaraj on the 'Superstar' title controversy: Rajinikanth will be the one forever

etimes.in / Aug 20, 2023, 15:35 (IST)

Sathyaraj has opened up about 'Superstar' title controversy in the press meet of upcoming Tamil film 'Angaaragan'. Sathyaraj has made some clear explanation to fans, and he said Rajinikanth will be the Superstar forever.

Parasakthi re-released as a tribute to Kalaignar on his centenary

TNN / Jun 05, 2023, 08:07 (IST)

The first film of legendary actor Sivaji Ganesan, 'Parasakthi,' for which the late Chief Minister M Karunanidhi wrote the screenplay, was screened in Chennai as part of the centenary celebrations of Kalaignar Karunanidhi on Sunday.
